column3:
On a benchmark project the scanning phase goes from 123 seconds -> 34
seconds with this change.

Hi,
Thanks for you request!
Some comments were added inline.

On Tue, Dec 8, 2015 at 11:14 PM, tomlu-google notifications@github.com
wrote:

I think we're seeing this drastic difference in performance because we have 12-core machines and it's traversing a networked (but quite fast) file system for a few thousand output jars. We are also seeing similar performance gains in indexing by increasing the index thread count via a system property, so for us it's very nice to have the same characteristics here.
